product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: H | MONOMER,STYRENE & SOLVENT PUMP ROOM & TANK > H1 | FOAM WATER SPRAY SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope.
a | 100 mm NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: heavy, standard: IS 1239 Part-1 (indian standard), fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reducers, clamps, ms(mild steel) support dash fasteners, painting: two coats approved primer, two coats approved paint, joints: grooved with groove coupling, scope: all related civil work, supports of vendor's scope

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: H | MONOMER,STYRENE & SOLVENT PUMP ROOM & TANK > H2 | FOAM GENERATOR
product_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications
a | 150 NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: class: C (heavy class), standard: IS 1239 (indian standard), fittings: threaded or grooved, included: elbow, tee, reducer, welding flanges, fixing: clamps to MS(mild steel) brackets/hangers, steel supports, primer: zinc chromate, paint: 2 coats red enamel, as per: fire authorities requirement, location: above ground

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: H | MONOMER,STYRENE & SOLVENT PUMP ROOM & TANK > H2 | FOAM GENERATOR
product_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Atmospheric Foam tank vertical type ,manufacturing as per ASME, section-VIII part- I. Tank shall be supplied along with all necessary valves, fittingss & instruments as per Technical data sheet attached with Tender documents.
a | Capacity of 250 ltr.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: manufacturing standard: ASME section-VIII part-I, included: all necessary valves, fittings & instruments as per technical data sheet attached with tender documents

product_entries.feature_or_specifications: concentration: 3%, PFOS/PFAS free, specific gravity: 1.0±.02 g/ml at 20°C, pH: 7.0-8.5, viscosity: 1200 ±300 cps
